name: Choosing the Right Architecture
description: Systematic approach to making architecture decisions based on actual requirements, not hype
trigger_phrases: How do I choose between architectures?
Is my app big enough for [complex pattern]?
context: You're facing an architecture decision and want to choose based on evidence, not trends. This journey teaches you to evaluate options systematically using quantitative criteria.

steps.why: Understand fundamental architecture patterns and their trade-offs
Learn a systematic framework for evaluating architecture options with real-world example

checkpoint.question: Can you identify quantitative thresholds for your architecture decision?
reflection: What's your actual user scale vs. the pattern's designed scale?
What's your team's capability gap for each option?
What's the cost difference in time and complexity?

steps.why: Gather actual requirements before choosing architecture
Design for your actual scale needs, not imagined future scale
Deep dive into architecture patterns for complex scenarios

completion_criteria: Can articulate quantitative criteria for architecture decisions
Understands when simple solutions beat complex ones
Can assess team capability gaps for different options
Knows how to defer decisions until you have more data
next_steps: Apply the decision framework to your specific architecture choice
Review generalist-leveling-up path for comprehensive architecture coverage
If building MVP, consider mvp-launch track to avoid over-engineering
